title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including variables, loops, and functions. This course is perfect for beginners who want to dive into the world of coding.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore the fascinating world of algorithms and problem-solving. This course covers key algorithms and data structures used in computer science and programming.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Master C++ programming while focusing on data structures and algorithms (DSA). This course is designed to help you build a strong foundation for competitive programming.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Delve into the world of fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and trees. This course is essential for anyone aspiring to become a skilled programmer.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover object-oriented programming (OOP) with Python. This course will teach you how to create reusable and efficient code using Python's OOP features.

title: Software Engineering
description: Learn the principles of software engineering and best practices in software development. This course is ideal for those aiming to become professional software developers.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Dive into the world of cloud computing and Amazon Web Services (AWS). This course will equip you with the skills to design, deploy, and manage cloud-based solutions.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Get hands-on experience with MySQL, one of the most popular relational database management systems. This course covers database design, querying, and administration.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course. It focuses on real-world problem-solving scenarios and strategies to tackle complex challenges.
